name: Sloppy tanks
description:
Tanks death match. Destroy the other player before they destroy you, but watch out - you're fighting on ice, so it's not gonna be easy.

Controls:
1st player:
w/s - move forward/backward
a/d - turn left/right
space - shoot
2nd player:
up/down arrows - move forward/backward
left/right arrows - turn left/right
right ctrl - shoot
